player.no_data: Player not loaded correctly in the plugin.
services.no_services: {red}Currently has no available services for purchase.
sklepsms.how_to_buy_wallet: {purple}To purchase a service with wallet funds, type {gold}!buywithwallet <service number>
sklepsms.how_to_buy_sms: {purple}To purchase a service via SMS, type {gold}!buysms <service number> {green} and follow the instructions.
services.buy_failed: {darkred}An error occurred during the service purchase. Make sure the entered SMS code is correct or you have sufficient funds in your wallet.
